caption:
🚨 Beware of AI-Driven Insurance Fraud! 🚨

Scammers are increasingly using AI tools like ChatGPT to create fake car accident photos and counterfeit insurance documents, leading to a surge in fraudulent claims. Insurers have reported a 300% increase in cases involving manipulated images over the past year. 

🚨 This alarming trend not only affects insurance companies but also drives up premiums for honest policyholders. It’s crucial to stay vigilant and ensure the authenticity of all submitted documents.

With AI being used to fake car crashes & insurance docs- what’s YOUR take?!
